name: I Spy for Kids
overview: I SPY AT THE ZOO SOMETHING BEGINNING WITH GI??? You can play I Spy for Kids down on the farm, at the seaside, or even in the greengrocers. And with three difficulties in each of the ten groups there are words to fox even the older children. You get ten points for any words you guess at the first attempt, but you lose one for each wrong answer. Good Luck, you'll need it.
